org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class ControlApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.ControlApi

public class ControlApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ Control API.

This class provides access to the control actions within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

Method Summary

public ControlHistoryResponse getHistory(Resource r)
                                  throws java.io.IOException
Get the Control history for the given Resource.

Parameters:
r - The Resource to query.
Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, a list of ControlHistory's are returned via ControlHistoryResponse.getControlHistory().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.

executeAction

public StatusResponse executeAction(Resource r,
                                    java.lang.String action,
                                    java.lang.String[] arguments)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Execute a Control action on the given Resource.

Parameters:
r - The Resource to execute the action on.
action - The action to run.
arguments - An array of arguments to pass to the action.
Returns:
ResponseStatus.SUCCESS if the action was executed successfully.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
